description: A gorge in Thessaly, Greece, located south of Mt. Olympus and north of Mt. Ossa. The Peneios river flows through the gorge.

properties.title: OSM Location: modern protected area: Κοιλάδα Τεμπών Λάρισας

history.comment: cleaned up references; added MANTO reference provided by MANTO team; added New Pauly, Wikidata, Chronique toponym reference, and ToposText references; added iDAI.gazetteer and Trismegistos references provided by bkiesling; added GeoNames reference provided by cbouras; added associated modern Names; added associated modern location, which supersedes the currently published location.
Global migration and reindexing of citations and provenance, February 2012
Detail text updated from former modernLocation. See http://atlantides.org/trac/pleiades/wiki/PlaceDetailsUpgrade

locations.title: OSM Location: modern protected area: Κοιλάδα Τεμπών Λάρισας
